author: Associated Press
title: Poorer NYC Neighborhoods Are Hit Hardest by Coronavirus
description: New data shows the COVID-19 pandemic is hitting especially hard in neighborhoods that tend to be poorer and more likely to have many people living under one roof.
content:
(NEW YORK) — The coronavirus pandemic has touched every part of New York City, but new data shows it is hitting especially hard in neighborhoods that tend to be poorer and might be more likely to have many people living under one roof.
Data released late Wed… [+2750 chars]
